<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A record for a potential prefetch made during the initial scan of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop. This is used to let a single prefetch target multiple memory accesses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/prefetch"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#ada4ee98e266564177ed0ddb2d1d13ee7">Prefetch</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The address formula for this prefetch as returned by ScalarEvolution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#abe7627ac85b04e66883d05bf27f2e2cf"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#abe7627ac85b04e66883d05bf27f2e2cf">LSCEVAddRec</a>;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The point of insertion for the prefetch instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#a5374d9e6077e58aa5b386cff17137285"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#a5374d9e6077e58aa5b386cff17137285">InsertPt</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// True if targeting a write memory access.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#a8b5b950dd3f8fe25c3eb7d28cf3f6860"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#a8b5b950dd3f8fe25c3eb7d28cf3f6860">Writes</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The (first seen) prefetched instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LSCEVAddRec)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumStridedMemAccesses++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t want to double prefetch individual cache lines. If this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// access is known to be within one cache line of some other one that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has already been prefetched, then don&#39;t prefetch this one as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DupPref = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Pref : Prefetches) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;PtrDiff = SE-&gt;getMinusSCEV(LSCEVAddRec, Pref.LSCEVAddRec);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevconstant">SCEVConstant</a> &#42;ConstPtrDiff =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PD &lt; (int64&#95;t) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>-&gt;getCacheLineSize()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
